title: Tick History Request
description: Get historic tick data for a given symbol.

ticks_history.description: Short symbol name (obtained from the active_symbols call).

end.description: Epoch value representing the latest boundary of the returned ticks. If "latest" is specified, this will be the latest available timestamp.

start.description: Epoch value representing the earliest boundary of the returned ticks (For styles: 'ticks', this will default to 1 day ago. For styles: 'candle', it will default to 1 day ago if count or granularity is undefined).

count.description: An upper limit on ticks to receive.

granularity.description: Only applicable for style : "candles". Candle time-dimension width setting. Allowed values 60, 120, 180, 300, 600, 900, 1800, 3600, 7200, 14400, 28800, 86400 (default: '60').

adjust_start_time.description: [Optional] 1 - if the market is closed at the end time, or license limit is before end time, adjust interval backwards to compensate.

subscribe.description: [Optional] 1 - to send updates whenever a new tick is received.

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
